Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Edge AI is changing where intelligence runs, and Microsoft Foundry streamlines building, shipping, and scaling these apps. This session explores Edge AI development with Microsoft Foundry, highlights new features in Foundry Local and everything you need to know to build client apps that run AI on-device. Discover how to use Azure Arc to deploy models on servers and edge devices, see live demonstrations, and learn how Foundry streamlines the transition of AI from cloud to edge efficiently.
